channel.description:
[B][CENTER] [URL=http://"artimproject.com"][IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/15dwfog.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"http://artimproject.com/community/index.php?/files/"]CHRISTMAS EVENT IS NOW LIVE ON ARTIM![/URL]
Artim is a brand-new series of community projects that will blow your mind!
Clients available @ [url=http://artimproject.com/community/index.php?/files/]Artim Custom Launcher[/url]
Check out our Youtube video!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6QdHSpxqi6s
[URL=http://"http://i.imgur.com/tlJQAWU.png"]New Custom Quests![/URL]
Artim Gun Game and more!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tlJQAWU.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://artimproject.com/community/index.php?/files/"]Insane clients![/URL]
Everything added that you would expect from a private server in 2015! This includes features such as fullscreen, different gameframes, choice in graphic settings, smileys, runescape cursors and much,much more!
[URL=http://"artimproject.com"]Awesome community & staff[/URL]
A community that cares for their players. Daily updates which are mentioned on the forums every week! Weekly polls for new content or changes. Staff members that will always be there to help you in your adventure in our unique world! And if that isn't enough, you can ask for help in the support section on our forum!
[URL=http://"artimproject.com"]Protected from DDoS/Dupes/Glitches[/URL]
Our servers are protectected from any kind of illegal DDoSing, Duping and/or Glitching attempts! If somehow you are still victim of any of those activities we will step in and fix it as soon as possible!
[URL=http://"artimproject.com"]What's so special about Artim?[/URL]
We are a community that is growing insanely fast and we are offering our members multiple (Currently 2, more to come) different servers!
Come and check us out today![/CENTER][/B]

item.title: || Artim || NEW RSPS || Customs || VPS || Beta Version || Need Staff ||
item.dc:creator: @Project_Runescape Project Runescape
item.description:
@Project_Runescape wrote:

DukeDice:

lol empty is an admin ofcourse he’d say that. I played the game as Chaos in-game name, but they have this MASSIVE gamebreaking bug, which unfortunately ruins it for the server. It freezes your character in place for around 8 hours out of the day, and i was listening to the admins talk with another player, and they said it was to be fixed in “today’s patch”, next day, still freezing. They know what is causing the bug, an xmas map, but they cant or simply won’t fix it. If they can just get this INSANE bug fixed, it would be great. When I did manage to actually give it a go, omg it was fun, just simple fun, not ridiculous 99 in 5minutes kinda server, it doesnt take like an hour to get a 99, but its a decent time so you still feel like you’ve earned your skillcape. community is friendly. hope they fix the bug, this server could be wonderful.

This is already fixed.

Clans and clan wars has been added with all the arenas read more here http://artimproject.com/forums/index.php?/topic/38-clan-wars/

Read full topic
item.source: || Artim || NEW RSPS || Customs || VPS || Beta Version || Need Staff ||

item.title: || Artim || NEW RSPS || Customs || VPS || Beta Version || Need Staff ||
item.dc:creator: @DukeDice DukeDice
item.description:
@DukeDice wrote:

lol empty is an admin ofcourse he’d say that. I played the game as Chaos in-game name, but they have this MASSIVE gamebreaking bug, which unfortunately ruins it for the server. It freezes your character in place for around 8 hours out of the day, and i was listening to the admins talk with another player, and they said it was to be fixed in “today’s patch”, next day, still freezing. They know what is causing the bug, an xmas map, but they cant or simply won’t fix it. If they can just get this INSANE bug fixed, it would be great. When I did manage to actually give it a go, omg it was fun, just simple fun, not ridiculous 99 in 5minutes kinda server, it doesnt take like an hour to get a 99, but its a decent time so you still feel like you’ve earned your skillcape. community is friendly. hope they fix the bug, this server could be wonderful.

Read full topic

item.title: || Artim || NEW RSPS || Customs || VPS || Beta Version || Need Staff ||
item.dc:creator: @Project_Runescape Project Runescape
item.description:
@Project_Runescape wrote:

[center]12/4/15 Updates
Construction shop talk to estate agent
Vorago drops ROW/Ring of Wealth 36% chance of getting it.
If you have a house you cant buy another one
Donation system
Fixed west varrock basement stairs this is used for clue scrolls.
Worldmessage if someone get punnished jailed/unjailed etc.
Changed dungeoneering teleport to misc button.
Vorago is now in multizone
Changed starter items
Changed dung prices and added farseer and eagle eye kiteshield.
Fixed quiz master random event might still be some small dialogue bugs just report if you find any.
Fixed vorago and 2 corp safespots.
Fixed slayer tasks.[/center]

Read full topic
